verses.verse: A psalm written by David Yahweh, you care for me like a shepherd cares for his sheep [MET]. So I have everything that I need [LIT].

You ◄refresh my soul/encourage me► and give me peace [MET] like a shepherd leads his sheep to places where is plenty of green grass for them to eat, and lets them rest beside streams where the water is flowing slowly.
You renew my strength. You guide me along the roads that are the right onesfor me in order that I can honor you.

Even when I walking through very dangerous dark ravines where I might ◄die/be killed►, I will not be afraid of anything because you are with me. You protect me like a shepherd protects his sheep. He uses his club and his walking stick to protect them from being attacked by wild animals.

You prepare a great feast for me, in a place where my enemies can see me. You ◄welcome/joyfully receive me►, as people ◄welcome/joyfully receive► the guests they have invited [MET] by pouring olive oil over their heads. You have given me very many blessings!
I am certain that you will be good to me and act mercifully toward me as long as I live; and then, O Yahweh, I will live in your home in heaven forever.
